title: The Jubilee Party manifesto: 5 claims fact-checked
subtitle: President Uhuru Kenyatta is up for re-election in next month’s poll. Do some of the claims made in his party’s new manifesto add up?
author: africacheck.org

in 2013, it said there was one police officer serving 1,150 Kenyans, promising to lower this ratio to 1:800 in its first term. With its new manifesto, it has revised the ratio it inherited to 1:500.

The police to population ratio refers to the number of police officers serving a community, relative to its size.

For example, if a community has 1 police officer serving 100 people, the ratio is 1:100.
